TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WsFederationConfiguration extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含 WS-Federation 驗證模組（）所需的所有組態設定。

span.span: Contains all of the configuration settings needed by the WS-Federation Authentication Module ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體類別上設定物件透過存取屬性包含用來初始化 WS-同盟驗證模組 (WSFAM) 和控制項的屬性設定其行為。An instance of the class that is set on the object accessed through the property contains the settings that are used to initialize the properties of the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM) and control its behavior. 這些設定通常會載入從``組態檔中的項目。These settings are typically loaded from the `` element in the configuration file.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.WSFederationElement federationElement) cil managed

param.name: federationElement
param.span: 要從其中初始化新執行個體的 項目。

span.span: The element from which to initialize the new instance.

summary.span: 從指定的 項目初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的執行個體的屬性會根據指定的設定初始化``項目。The properties of the new instance are initialized according to the settings of the specified `` element. 會對某些驗證所指定物件`federationElement`。Some validation is performed on the object specified by `federationElement`. 這兩個屬性和屬性必須指定非 null 且非空白值。Both the property and the property must specify non-null, non-empty values. 如果屬性設定`true`、屬性必須指定 HTTPS 配置的 URI。If the property is set `true`, the property must specify a URI that has an HTTPS scheme. 屬性不能為負數。The property cannot be negative. 如果不符合上述任何情況，會擲回例外狀況。If any of these conditions are not met, an exception is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string issuer, string realm) cil managed
Public Sub New (issuer As String, realm As String)

param.name: issuer
param.span: 字串，包含 WS-Federation 驗證模組 (WSFAM) 所要使用的簽發者的 URI。

span.span: A string that contains the URI of the issuer to be used by the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM).

param.name: realm
param.span: 字串，包含 WSFAM 所要使用的要求領域的 URI。

span.span: A string that contains the URI of the requesting realm to be used by the WSFAM.

summary.span: 使用指定的簽發者和領域，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified issuer and realm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性會根據初始化`issuer`和`realm`參數。The and properties are initialized according to the `issuer` and `realm` parameters. 所有其他屬性會初始化成為其預設值。All other properties are initialized to their default values.

span.span: is .
-or-
is .

value.span: 指定驗證類型的 URI。

span.span: A URI that specifies the authentication type.

value.span: 預設為空字串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

value.span: 如果必須使用 HTTPS 保護與 STS 的通訊，則為 ，否則為。

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wtrealm 參數，這是由應該使用屬性，而非這個參數。The wtrealm parameter, which is set by the property, should be used instead of this parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SignInQueryString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

value.span: 預設為空字串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.
